meanings.definition: Capable of evolving or developing over time.
meanings.sent1: The evolvable software program continuously improves its performance.
meanings.sent2: Living organisms are evolvable and can change to survive in different environments.
meanings.sent3: The evolvable robot decided to upgrade its own parts for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an evolvable puzzle, constantly rearranging its pieces.
meanings.sent5: The evolvable nature of technology ensures progress and innovation.

meanings.definition: Able to adapt and change in response to new circumstances.
meanings.sent1: The evolvable strategy allowed the team to quickly adjust to unexpected challenges.
meanings.sent2: His evolvable mindset helped him thrive in the ever-changing business world.
meanings.sent3: The evolvable plant surprised everyone by growing in a different direction each day.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like an evolvable dance, gracefully adapting to any rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The evolvable nature of the market demands constant flexibility and innovation.
